Tolkien-related events that took place in 2021.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
12 - A synopsis for The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power series is released.
23 - Tolkien and the Classical World is published.
25 - Tolkien's Modern Reading is published.
? - Amon Hen 287 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 13 - The Tolkien Society Seminar on the theme of "Twenty-first Century Receptions of Tolkien" is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

content.title: March
content.content:
18 - A new illustrated edition of The Silmarillion is published.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.

content.title: May
content.content:
10 - Houghton Miffin is bought by HarperCollins.
27 - A new paperback edition of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight: with Pearl and Sir Orfeo is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
10 - The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim is officially announced.
10 - The Science of Middle-earth is published.
? - Amon Hen 289 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
3 - 4 - The Tolkien Society Seminar on the theme of "Tolkien and Diversity" is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
29 - Switzerland in Tolkien's Middle-Earth is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - Filming for the first season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is wrapped.
10 - Tolkien Calendar 2022 is published.
19 - The Gallant Edith Bratt is published.
? - Amon Hen 290 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - The Nature of Middle-earth is published.
2 - 5 - Oxonmoot 2021 held online and at St Anne's College, Oxford.
16 - A new audiobook of The Lord of the Rings narrated by Andy Serkis is released digitally.
23 - The Lord of the Rings: Rise to War is released online.

content.title: October
content.content:
14 - A new edition of The Lord of the Rings is published, including for the first time 30 images and sketches by J.R.R. Tolkien.
14 - A new audiobook of The Lord of the Rings narrated by Andy Serkis is released physically.
30 - Middle-earth Strategy Battle Game: Fall of the Necromancer is released.
? - Amon Hen 291 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - The Tolkien Society Seminar on the theme of "Translating and Illustrating Tolkien" is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
10 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Fate of Gundabad expansion is released.
11 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien is republished.

content.title: December
content.content:
2 - British actor Antony Sher dies.
? - Amon Hen 292 is published.
? - Mallorn 62 is publsihed.
